original: @76a * // dpal bde mchog gi s'atstsha brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: @76a * // dpal bde mchog gi s'atstsha brjod par bya ste /
translated: The samayasattva of glorious Cakrasaṃvara is as follows.

original: de nas 'jim pa byas la mdun du bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas 'jim pa byas la mdun du bzhag la /
translated: Then, having made the clay, place it in front.

original: khrus byas nas sems bskyed de /
analyzed: khrus byas nas sems bskyed de /
translated: After washing, arouse the mind of awakening.

original: bdag nyid skad cig mas lhar bsgoms la /
analyzed: bdag nyid skad cig mas lhar bsgoms la /
translated: Meditate on yourself as the deity in an instant.

original: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya /
translated: Meditate on the four immeasurables.

original: de chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags kyis 'dag pa mi dmigs par bya ste yi ge h'um bsam /
analyzed: de chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags kyis 'dag pa mi dmigs par bya ste yi ge h'um bsam /
translated: Make the reality-womb mantra pure, and make the nonobservation of purity.

original: de las rdo rje /
analyzed: de las rdo rje /
translated: From that, imagine a vajra.

original: de las he ru ka yab yum du bskyed do //
analyzed: de las he ru ka yab yum du bskyed do //
translated: From that, generate Heruka with the mother.

original: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyan drangs la he ru ka yab yum la bstim par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyan drangs la he ru ka yab yum la bstim par bya'o //
translated: Then, the light rays from the hūṃ in one’s heart invite the buddhas and bodhisattvas, who dissolve into the Heruka with the mother.

original: de nas yab yum snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu ste byang chub sems su gnas pa la he ru ka'i snying po'am /
analyzed: de nas yab yum snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu ste byang chub sems su gnas pa la he ru ka'i snying po'am /
translated: Then, the father and mother enter into union and melt into bodhicitta.

original: nye ba'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po nyi shu rtsa gcig gis byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Bless it with the essence mantra of Heruka or the twenty-one near essence mantras.

original: yang sngags kyis gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: yang sngags kyis gdab par bya'o //
translated: Again, sprinkle it with the mantra.

original: s'a tstsha re re la he ru ka re re bsams la /
analyzed: s'a tstsha re re la he ru ka re re bsams la /
translated: Imagine that each sācchaka is a Heruka.

original: de re re las kyang he ru ka mang po spros la de rnams kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par byed par bsam mo //
analyzed: de re re las kyang he ru ka mang po spros la de rnams kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par byed par bsam mo //
translated: Imagine that many Herukas emanate from each of them and that they accomplish the aims of oneself and all sentient beings.

original: rten 'brel gyi sngags bzlas pas mjug bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: rten 'brel gyi sngags bzlas pas mjug bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: One should conclude by reciting the mantra of dependent origination.

original: de nas grub na mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul /
analyzed: de nas grub na mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul /
translated: Then, if one is able, one should offer the five offerings.

original: ma grub na me tog gtor la bskor ba bya'o //
analyzed: ma grub na me tog gtor la bskor ba bya'o //
translated: If one is not able, one should scatter flowers and circumambulate.

original: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che //
analyzed: mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che //
translated: Ferocious, with bared fangs,

original: sngags kyi me tog phreng bas brgyan //
analyzed: sngags kyi me tog phreng bas brgyan //
translated: adorned with a garland of mantra flowers,

original: sha chen rab tu gsol mdzad pa //
analyzed: sha chen rab tu gsol mdzad pa //
translated: devoutly offering great meat,

original: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise Heruka.

original: de nas smon lam gdab /
analyzed: de nas smon lam gdab /
translated: Then, one should make aspirations.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: One should dedicate the roots of merit.

original: bde mchog gi s'a tstsha'i @76b lugs rdzogs so//
analyzed: bde mchog gi s'a tstsha'i @76b lugs rdzogs so//
translated: The system of the sācchas of Cakrasaṃvara is complete.

original: * // de nas rab gnas rgyas pa byed na /
analyzed: * // de nas rab gnas rgyas pa byed na /
translated: Then, if one is performing the extensive consecration,

original: gong du bstan pa ltar s'a tstsha gang 'grub btab la /
analyzed: gong du bstan pa ltar s'a tstsha gang 'grub btab la /
translated: one should make as many sācchas as one can, as previously explained.

original: de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor du skad cig mas bsgom /
analyzed: de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor du skad cig mas bsgom /
translated: Then, one should meditate on the yoga of one’s deity instantaneously.

original: s'a tstsha de stong pa nyid du bsam /
analyzed: s'a tstsha de stong pa nyid du bsam /
translated: Think that the sācchas are emptiness.

original: de las padma'i gdan bsgom /
analyzed: de las padma'i gdan bsgom /
translated: From that, meditate on a lotus seat.

original: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ;
analyzed: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ;
translated: On top of that, think of an āḥ, from which arises a moon maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du h'um bsam /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um bsam /
translated: On top of that, think of a hūṃ.

original: de las 'od 'phros pas sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas /
analyzed: de las 'od 'phros pas sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas /
translated: Light shines from that hūṃ, purifies the obscurations of all sentient beings,

original: 'od kyis slar la 'dus pas h'um la thim /🔽h'um de yang 'od du zhu ba las dpal he ru ka yab yum du gsal bar bsgoms la /
analyzed: 'od kyis slar la 'dus pas h'um la thim / h'um de yang 'od du zhu ba las dpal he ru ka yab yum du gsal bar bsgoms la /
translated: and the light gathers back and dissolves into the hūṃ.🔽That hūṃ also melts into light and is visualized as Śrī Heruka with the mother.

original: rang gi snying ga'i h'um gi 'od kyis ye shes kyi he ru ka yab yum spyan drangs la bstim mo //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i h'um gi 'od kyis ye shes kyi he ru ka yab yum spyan drangs la bstim mo //
translated: The light from the hūṃ at one’s heart invites the gnosis Heruka with the mother, who dissolves into that.

original: de nas dbang bskur la spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsgom mo //
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur la spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsgom mo //
translated: Then, confer the empowerment and meditate on Akṣobhya at the crown.

original: de nas mchod pa dang rgyan rnams dbul lo //
analyzed: de nas mchod pa dang rgyan rnams dbul lo //
translated: Then, offer the offerings and ornaments.

original: he ru ka'i snying po bzlas /
analyzed: he ru ka'i snying po bzlas /
translated: Recite the essence mantra of Heruka.

original: rten 'brel gyi sngags lan gsum bzlas /
analyzed: rten 'brel gyi sngags lan gsum bzlas /
translated: Recite the dependent origination mantra three times.

original: de nas smon lam gdab bo//
analyzed: de nas smon lam gdab bo//
translated: Then, make aspirations.

original: de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngo'o //
analyzed: de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngo'o //
translated: Then, dedicate the roots of merit to awakening.

original: s'a tstsha gtsang sar bzhugs gsol /
analyzed: s'a tstsha gtsang sar bzhugs gsol /
translated: The sācchas are placed in a clean place.

original: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru kāra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: t'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: t'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
translated: Tākinī jālāṃbhasvaha.

original: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ ha ha hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tu n'e sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
analyzed: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tu n'e sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba dat /
translated: Ye dharmā hetu prabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat.

original: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
analyzed: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na:/
translated: Teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ.

original: s'atstsha'i tsheg ma h'a pradzny'a rakshi tas mdzad pa lo ts'a ba bshes gnyen pa ris bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: s'atstsha'i tsheg ma h'a pradzny'a rakshi tas mdzad pa lo ts'a ba bshes gnyen pa ris bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
translated: The Mahāprajñārakṣita composed the Sācchashegshma. The translator Sherab Pal translated it. It is complete.
